conbody.p: Katalon also creates sample custom keywords in this sample project. To learn more about custom keywords, you can refer to this document: Introduction to custom keywords.
To view our sample custom keywords, in the Test Explorer panel, go to Keywords > sample. Double-click one of the following .groovy files:

row.entry: This file contains a custom keyword that waits for the overlay in the Checkout page to disappear.
This file contains custom keywords that perform checkout actions.
This file contains custom keywords that perform login actions.
This file contains custom keywords that perform selecting actions.
This file contains custom keywords that perform adding-to-the-cart actions.
This file contains keywords that assist the keywords in the Select2.groovy file.

image.alt: Custom keywords in the Shopping Cart sample

conbody.p: Custom keywords can be reused many times in test cases to perform different actions such as logging in, adding items to the cart, and checking out. You can see the use of custom keywords in our sample test cases as below: Test cases.
